I was out there watching, Allen Iverson hollered across the locker room after Carmelo Anthony scored a career-high 49 points to lead the Denver Nuggets past the Washington Wizards 111-100 Friday night. over the CEO title at Google to cofounder Larry Page NEW YORK( CNNMoney)-- Eric Schmidt will step down from his role as Google's CEO in April and be replaced by co-founder Larry Page. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a prepared statement.
